articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: AB de Villiers throws down gauntlet for South Africa's T20 World Cup quest in four-word 'open letter' - Hindustan Times
articles.description: South Africa face Afghanistan in the semi-final of the 2024 T20 World Cup  | Crickit
articles.content: South Africa are one of two teams to still remain unbeaten in the 2024 T20 World Cup, with the other being India, and will continue their quest to end their dry run in major trophies when they face a… [+2091 chars]
